system.description:
You may spend a bonus action to create an arcane eye effect with the following modifications: 

  • The eye does not require concentration and lasts indefinitely unless attacked or dismissed by you (requiring no action). If the eye is destroyed or dismissed, you may create another, requiring another bonus action. 

  • The eye has normal hearing as well as sight.

You can use this feature at will, but you can only create one of these effects at a time.
